summary: Highly driven Senior Software Engineer with a decade of experience across diverse industries including Real Estate, Payments, Health, and Finance. Specialized in Web Development. Passionate about enhancing Developer Experience, Design Systems, and focused on create a high impact to organizations and communities.

accomplishments: Participated in Backstage implementation to increase the Developer Experience (DX) for over 200 developers across various regions.
Created a system to measure Software Reuse at Scotiabank, and provided insights to teams reusing in more than 3000 repos.
Lead an community made of teams from regions across America, to promote software reusability and new initiatives.
Advocated of InnerSource at Scotiabank, by creating documentation, templates, provided talks and guidance to teams.
Architect and write Front-End code for the foundation and complex features of important projects in Colombia.
Work closely with our design and UX teams to deliver next generation experiences across our applications using Angular.
Created technical documentation for Front-end guidelines in Colombia.
Implemented successfully a Microfrontend architecture for 7 application in one of the most important customer flows.
Created and maintained group of reusable libraries for Front-end projects in Colombia.
Led a Front-End community made of ~20 people and keep up the collaborative culture.
Developed scalable React + Redux applications for global Endava clients, using pm2, yarn, ES6, SASS, Webpack 2.x, Semantic UI, Node.js, Express.js, Redux-Saga, and Firebase.
Performed code reviews and documented Confluence projects.
Worked on Project Helios, a global alliance between Renault and Nissan to develop a new global digital customer engagement platform.
Utilized JAVA, J2EE, Servlets, AEM (Adobe Experience Manager), JavaScript, BackboneJS, MarionetteJS, Spring Framework, ApiGee, MongoDB, and Elastic Search.
Supported QA Teams in setting up environments and providing mock data.
Conducted demos to clients and prepared QA environments.

education.certificate: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Colombia
